Making the Correct 38 CFR 3.360 Decision
The table below contains instructions for addressing the issue of basic eligibility to health care under
38 CFR 3.360
in the administrative decision.
Important
:  As noted directly above in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.B.1.c
, do not make a decision on basic eligibility to health care pursuant to
38 CFR 3.360
if basic eligibility to
all
VA benefits is appropriately established under other regulations applicable to discharges.  This block
only

38 CFR 3.12

38 CFR 3.360
at issue.
